name: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Site Set out as per construction plan provided with GPS location and 3D model provided by designers. Site set out inspected with designers/MSQA and client ensure criteria is acceptable.

METHODS OR REFERENCE - TDM Technical Standards - FP0001
